definition: the reflex act of ejecting the contents of the stomach through the mouth, eject the contents of the stomach through the mouth
details:
noun
- the reflex act of ejecting the contents of the stomach through the mouth
= synonyms: vomiting, emesis, regurgitation, disgorgement, puking
- a medicine that induces nausea and vomiting
= synonyms: emetic, vomitive, nauseant
- the matter ejected in vomiting
= synonyms: puke, vomitus, barf
verb
- eject the contents of the stomach through the mouth
= example: eject the contents of the stomach through the mouth
= synonyms: cast
